## ShortcutParameters.enabled property

whether to activate the action

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enabled?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

`false` means event listener will be removed from the node, effectively disable all triggers.

To disable only certain triggers, use the `enabled` option in the trigger definition instead.
